snippet: A Kyrgyz defense official said a crucial air base should have “no military mission” when its lease expires, creating a potential hurdle to American withdrawal plans in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: A Kyrgyz defense official said a crucial air base should have “no military mission” when its lease expires, creating a potential hurdle to American withdrawal plans in Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Kyrgyzstan Wants Military Role to End at U.S. Base
headline.main: Kyrgyzstan Wants Military Role to End at U.S. Base
headline.print_headline: Kyrgyzstan Wants Military Role to End at U.S. Base

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
